item.title: How do I add npc drops?
item.dc:creator: @gurt gurt
item.description:
@gurt wrote:

How do I add npc drops heres the code, but I donâ€™t know the code for drops

{ if (npcs[i].npcType == 2026){ //Barrows Dharok npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.dharok = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2025){ //Barrows Ahrim npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.ahrim = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2027){ //Barrows Guthan npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.guthan = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2028){ //Barrows Karil npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.karil = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2029){ //Barrows Torag npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.torag = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2030){ //Barrows Verac npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.verac = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2036){ //Barrows Skeletons npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; }
